item.title: Asian shares trade mostly higher after stocks on Wall Street extend losses
item.description: Asian shares are mostly higher in muted trading after discouraging U.S. economic data pulled Wall Street stocks lower

item.title: Krill fishery in Antarctica shut down after record catch triggers closure
item.description: Officials have shut down the krill fishery near Antarctica early after exceeding the seasonal catch limit for the first time
